headline: Project A11Y: how we upgraded Cloudflare’s dashboard to adhere to industry accessibility standards
keywords: Birthday Week, Accessibility, Better Internet, Dashboard, User Research
description: At Cloudflare, we believe the Internet should be accessible to everyone. And today, we’re happy to announce a more inclusive Cloudflare dashboard experience: adherence to the industry accessibility standards, including WCAG 2.1 AA and section 508 compliance.
